name: Dungeon Dash (Olafur97, Finde_bow)
description:
Dungeon Dash is a simple platformer made for a game design class. The game is made from a template that was provided for us by the school. The levels are our own and some of the mechanics in the game were made by us.

The mechanics made by us:

  • Spikes
  • Enemies
  • Gates
  • Buttons

------How To Play------

Move - WASD or arrow keys to move around the level and to aim your dash.

Jump - Space bar

Dash - left shift to dash in the direction your character is moving.

Reset - R

To restart the game press R on the game over screen.

------CREDITS------
Developers: Olafur97 and Finde_bow

Made using Gem Dash template created by Torfi Ásgeirsson

Music: Red Pills Club by Andrea La Rosa https://3d63.itch.io/electric-pawer

Additional sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
